$client = new SqsClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2012-11-05'
]);

try {
    $result = $client->listQueues();
    foreach ($result->get('QueueUrls') as $queueUrl) {
        echo "$queueUrl\n";
    }
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    error_log($e->getMessage());
}
